Detailed Description

A pie chart data source.

Member Function Documentation

- (CPFill *) sliceFillForPieChart: (CPPieChart *)  pieChart
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a fill for the given pie chart slice. This method is optional.

Parameters:
pieChart The pie chart.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The pie slice fill for the slice with the given index.
- (CPTextLayer *) sliceLabelForPieChart: (CPPieChart *)  pieChart
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a label for the given pie chart slice. This method is optional.

Parameters:
pieChart The pie chart.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The pie slice label for the slice with the given index. If you return nil, the default pie slice label will be used. If you return an NSNull, no label will be shown for the index in question.
